website_summaries.verdict: The Harden B/E 3 sport a modern design, a cozy fit, and the ability to turn on a dime when you need it the most.
cons: If you prefer laces, these aren’t for you

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. I normally wear an 11 wide and can get away with the half size more for none wide shoes. These were even narrow for that. Not for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great price for durable stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: So I don't want to rate the sizing because I thought I was ordering a 12.5 in toddler. As you can imagine when a box was on my porch the size of 2 xboxs put together I was a bit confused. I opened the box to realize they were men's to my surprise they looked like great qaulity for the price. The tongue and ankle area is a lol more high top then pictured love the two tone and the splat bottom. Wish they were his size !
customer_reviews.author: Raven Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Harden To Put On...LOL
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a halfway decent shoe to wear to work and this shoe will serve it's purpose. They are comfortable once you can fight your foot to get them on. I had to loosed the strings and put on a thin no show sock. The struggle is real when putting them on but other than that they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: ZeeTyson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best fitting shoes I've had in a while. I love the velcro strap. It keeps the laces from catching on things or untying, provides extra ankle support, and if worn as an every day shoe, you can just leave the laces untied and use the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Decent Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: The fit is kind of snug, but manageable. I don't really like the laces and the velcro together. The laces stick out of the velcro strap and it looks really tacky. Comfortable shoe though, despite how snug they are.
customer_reviews.author: AJay_89

customer_reviews.title: They are authentic
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were authentic and very new. I was relieved they were authentic and very new. This seller is good. Now my swag is right
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & style
customer_reviews.text: Good quality & unique style. They can be a little hard to put on, tight at top, but comfortable once on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just a little wide at the forefoot
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 11 in all shoes and bought a size 11. The forefoot is a little wide. I wore with thin socks and my feet slid I wore 2 socks and that solved the issue. I wear the shoe for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Khae Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basketball shoe for my kid in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Bought these ahead of my son’s basketball season, he loves adidas and he loves white shoes. The strap helps secure his laces and he loves the pattern of the sole. The shoes were a great value.
customer_reviews.author: JD Torres

customer_reviews.title: Brand new shoes - NOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these brand new, though when they came today in the mail, there were pebbles in the sole of each shoe and grass markings on both shoes. Obviously, NOT brand new!! Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Inspect and Send back as there is a time limit to do so
customer_reviews.text: Length wise thus shoe fits but it is very narrow in width and height. Now I understand why they were only $26.00
customer_reviews.author: David Perez

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son without his approval and he loves them. The look is cool. Bought a 13 1/2 and fits great. I haven't seen any tears yet so that's good. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Checks all the boxes for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wear it strictly for Jumping Rope. High-top Basketball shoes are the best for jumping for me since they also provide additional ankle support. This beauty provides all the comfort I need when Jumping rope, so soft. It has that soft sock-like feel yet provides very strong support! You have to hold it and wear it to believe it. Great shoes! Go half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Shoe good
customer_reviews.text: Really good shoe great support only kinda complain is if you are tall lanky body type you may want to invest in ankle guards as this is a lower/mid type shoe. All other qualities are great, has really good impact support for landings, and amazing grip 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Meggen

customer_reviews.title: Great foot comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit and easy to get on, even with heel cushions. Totally cushiony and comfortable, I had to buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Good feel
customer_reviews.text: Good cushioned feel but a bit bulky around the sole. However I still like them.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.K., Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Fit huge, but look great!
customer_reviews.text: Great, as advertised, but they are HUGE. Ordered an 8, but fit more like a 9.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy/Classy/Smart-A@@-y

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!
customer_reviews.text: They are hard to clean though, but he is very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, great price($39.99) Added to the collection!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for an unbeatable price. I loved the grey colorways, and when I saw them for $39.99 It had to happen. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Logan

customer_reviews.title: Very good support
customer_reviews.text: Great support and cushioning is fantastic. It does run true length wise, but are a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Derek H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Shoe fits as expected. Gives support where needed while playing basketball. Everything I needed in a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them for basketball, they fit great and have alot of support around the ankle
customer_reviews.author: twila smith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my kid, he really loved it and the fit and the style are both great.
customer_reviews.author: FST

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kid he jumped for joy when I saw them and they fit him like they were made just for him awesome and the price is great
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I like the laces under the strap
customer_reviews.author: ed cawley

customer_reviews.title: He loved them
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for someone and he loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but fit is a bit tight in toe area
customer_reviews.author: DERRICK

customer_reviews.title: Description of product was not clear
customer_reviews.text: Wanted tennis shoe with ankle support. Ad did not clarify that support included lacing. Should have been all velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Leo1

customer_reviews.title: Available in size 20
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe I have ever ordered for my son that actually fits. He loves the comfort and great looking style.
customer_reviews.author: Deb E

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Real comfortable colors are as seen on shopping page extremely happy with shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his news shoes! Very sharp looking shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t need a title
customer_reviews.text: Very nice got the white ones too Very good on the basketball court
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, came early, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson ..he said they hurt his feet really bad
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Customer for life.
customer_reviews.text: So happy that the product is as shown and fits to my size that was ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Crunch

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for basketball or just casual
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were a perfect fit and very good quality fir the price
customer_reviews.author: Tapoo

customer_reviews.title: Not real good.
customer_reviews.text: They started coming apart after a few times of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Harden B/E 3 Basketball Shoe
product_meta.description: Inspired by James Harden's childhood friends, these men's basketball shoes are designed for his signature game. Built with an adjustable strap for stability and fit, they feature a padded internal collar that lets you Euro step in comfort. A herringbone outsole gives you the traction needed to stop on a dime and create separation from your man.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch
B-ball shoes that honor James Harden's childhood friends
Regular fit; Hook-and-loop strap closure with large hook-and-loop pad for tailored lockdown; Sock-like construction hugs the foot
Textile upper with padded collar for support
Bounce cushioning provides enhanced comfort and flexibility
Multidirectional herringbone-pattern rubber outsole for grip
